action.command: execute as @s at @s run summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Marker:1b,CustomName:{"text":"Enraged Vindication","color":"dark_grey"},Invisible:1b,PersistenceRequired:1b,Invulnerable:1b,NoGravity:1b,Tags:["enragedVindMarker","tempVind"]}

actions.command: function phlime:sid/vind
execute as @s at @s as @e if score @p vindSID = @s vindSID at @e run tp @s[type=minecraft:armor_stand] ~ ~ ~ -180 0
execute positioned ~ ~1.15 ~ run function phlime:particles/vindication_start
tag @s add phlimeTempImmune
tag @s add tempPhlimeSelector
execute positioned ~ ~2 ~ positioned ^2 ^ ^-2 facing ~1 ~ ~ run function phlime:particles/vindication_linger

condition.command: execute as @s if score @a[tag=tempPhlimeSelector,limit=1,sort=nearest] vindSID = @s vindSID

actions.command: tag @s remove phlimeTempImmune
tag @s remove tempPhlimeSelector

action.command: execute as @s at @s as @e if score @p vindSID = @s vindSID run kill @s[type=minecraft:armor_stand]
